product_name: Partners West How to Hike the A.T.
long_description: How to Hike the A.T.: The Nitty-Gritty Details Of A Long-Distance Trek provides information on how to prepare for the 2,100 mi. trip by focusing on trail safety, resupply towns and proper gear.
short_description: How to Hike the A.T.: The Nitty-Gritty Details Of A Long-Distance Trek provides information on how to prepare for the 2,100 mi. trip by focusing on trail safety, resupply towns and proper gear.
